alert.note: Alert for Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft; Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 3:20PM MDT until April 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches in the Upper Rio Grande Valley/Eastern San Juan Mountains below 10000 feet and Sagruache County East of the Continental Divide below 10000 feet, and 4 to 7 inches in the Leadville Vicinity/Lake County below 11000 feet, and Western Chaffee County between 9000 and 11000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Leadville Vicinity/Lake County Below 11000 Feet, Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Feet, Saguache County East of Continental Divide Below 10000 Feet and Upper Rio Grande Valley/Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Feet. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Significant blowing snow likely. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
